title: Figure
description:
Got three minutes and want to make some music? 

Figure is the fun music-making app for instant inspiration. 

Create an addictive beat before the next bus stop or lay down a beefy bass line while waiting in line at the bank. Figure will have you making music within seconds yet is deep enough for endless play on a transatlantic flight.

Figure highlights
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Make songs with Drums, Bass and Lead Synth
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play by sliding your finger across the play pad
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Always stay in key and on the beat
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ No previous playing skills required 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tweak and twist your track on the fly
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Sounding amazing has never been this easy
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The sound of Reason on your phone!


Truly designed for mobile user on the go, Figure gives you drums, bass and lead synth, controlled by an incredibly easy to use touch interface that gets you sounding great literally in seconds. Slide your finger across the play pad and hear your bass line play. Tweak the Rhythm, Range and Scale Step wheels to get the result youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re after. Programming drumbeats is just as easy. Set the rhythm and play the drums with your fingers. You wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t want to stop. You wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t believe how amazing you and your phone can sound.

If you are new to music making, getting started making great sounding tracks has never been this easy Ã¢â‚¬â€ and sounded so great!

If you are a seasoned musician Ã¢â‚¬â€œ music creation has never been this fun!

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play in different keys & modes. Set once or change on the fly.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Increase the Shuffle to loosen up your beats 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Turn up Pump to add a club sound to your tracks
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Adjust levels using PropellerheadÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s legendary mixer
